Class FontDetector

java.lang.Object
  edu.stanford.nlp.swing.FontDetector
public class FontDetector
extends Object

Detects which Fonts can be used to display unicode characters in a given language.

Author:
Huy Nguyen (htnguyen@cs.stanford.edu)
